comment:
no stars

          Simply cannot recommend under any conditions, perhaps as a baseline for what you should never EVER do to whiskey.  Perhaps a jalapeno by itself, but this combo of pepper and honey simply doesnt work.  It's difficult to imagine someone actually said this was a "GO" to release on.  This is likely the clear result of what happens when you put marketers in charge who don't understand what bourbon whiskey is about. 
    
 Not recommended.. NO GO... BROKEN ARROW
